name: TestSubject
description:
Hello! This is a game about you as a Test subject and a Narrator. This is between you and him. This is a top down Shooter but the thing is. you cant shoot. So its just a top down game.  Once you are done. Please give me some feedback here https://docs.google.com/forms/d/190cI6hzIyKDHd2YPwp2K6M5wp2k-oHm615IQpw02tpw/edit thanks!

I realized that the post processing is a bit too much, so try to lower your brightness to be able to see the outline of the game objects. And PLEASE follow the narrator's dialogue as it explains the core movement and such.
